mxlibrary: [{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Domain Event: Important system event."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Command: Action that triggers one or more events."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Rol: individuo quien ejecuta un comando, puede ser una persona o un sistema externo."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Aggregate: Represents the state of our system. Domain objects that can be treated as a single unit."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Policy: Represents a decision/rule business."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Read Model: read model is a model specialized for reads, that is, queries."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"External System: External system such as payment gateways or any other type of service that is outside our domain."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"View: View with which a user interacts."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":80,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Note: Note or comment about important information."},{"xml":"","w":640,"h":280,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Sub Contex: grouping according to a sub context."},{"xml":"","w":640,"h":280,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Bounded Context: Bounded context grouping."},{"xml":"","w":640,"h":280,"aspect":"fixed","title":"General Context: General context that groups everything."},{"xml":"","w":160,"h":1,"aspect":"fixed","title":"Connector: Object connector"}]
